evidence: Clear separation of concerns with distinct modules: cli, core, directives, formatters, parser, plugins, utils
Each module has its own __init__.py and contains related functionality
Plugins architecture with separate plugin classes in plugins/ directory
Formatters module with multiple output format implementations
Core module containing business logic separated from IO operations
Parser module dedicated to parsing nginx configurations
Low average fan-out (1.76) indicating good modularization
Directory depth of 4 shows reasonable separation without over-engineering
risks: Some modules like 'core' might become too large and require further decomposition
Plugin architecture could evolve into microservices if scaled significantly
Tight coupling between parser and directive modules through nginx-specific logic
